Usage¶

Installation¶

To use subproptools, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install subproptools

Extracting Atomic Properties¶

To retrieve a dictionary of the atomic properties, you can use the subproptools.qtaimExtract.get_atomic_properties() function

subproptools.qtaimExtract.get_atomic_props(data)¶

Returns a dictionary of atomic properties

Parameters:

data (list[str]) – The string lines of a .sum file

Returns:

Dicionary with a key for each atom in the molecule

Return type:

dict

subproptools
